name: Mineralia
description:
The dwarf king mandates you harvest 100 crystals in 15 days… or face his wrath!

Mineralia is a light mining & colony-building simulator made for the Ludum Dare 52 Compo.

Use mouse to play. Left click to select, right click to deselect.

Players must carefully balance their resources in order to expand their mining operation and harvest enough crystals to appease the king. Start by lighting the cave, then hunt for precious Gold Veins and Crystals to mine. Keep in mind your workforce will need food and shelter, or they may abandon your cause. Gain 100 crystals by the end of Day 15 and you win!

Made for Ludum Dare 52 - Harvest.
